MOVE_FLEET: Sending apologies, fleet leaving zone of yours.
LIKE_GREET: Nice to see a friend of mine. Good Trading today?
DEFESIVE_PACT: Friend of mine, shall we defensively cooperate?
BORDER_WARS: A fleet of yours named %1$s has crossed borders of Parlamek! War, enemy operator!
ASK_PROTECTION: Sending payment if you leave fleet of mine alone for 5 star years, good trade?
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: A fleet of yours named %1$s has crossed sector of Parlamek. Requesting retreat!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: Friend of mine, shall we share spy data?
DECLINE_WAR: Unwise of yours. War, %1$s enemy operator!
NOTHING_TO_TRADE: Sending apologies. I thought we could engage trading operations.
DECLINE_ANGER: Bad trade, bad trade, foolish operator!
FRIENDS_GREET: Nice to see a friendly operator!
OFFER_REJECTED: Send requestions of yours, trading operator.
ALLIANCE: Friend of mine, shall we cooperate together?
TRADE_ALLIANCE: Friend of mine, shall we engage trading cooperation?
HATE_GREET: Choose your words wisely, foolish operator!
ASK_MOVE_SPY: Espionage fleet of yours named %1$s has crossed privacy of Parlameks. Requesting retreat, now!
